title: CodeTour schema for the tour.json file

title.description: Specifies the title of the code tour.

description.description: Specifies an optional description for the code tour.

ref.description: Indicates the git ref (branch/commit/tag) that this tour associate with.

steps.description: Specifies the list of steps that are included in the code tour.

file.description: Specifies the file path (relative to the workspace root) that is associated with the current step.

uri.description: Specifies an absolute URI that is associated with the current step.

line.description: Specifies the line number that is associated with the current step.

title.description: Specifies an optional title for the step

description.description: Specifies the description of the current step.
